data.name: RIFT - Prophecy of Ahnket Expansion Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Comet of Ahnket threatens to devour Telara. Will you stand against it? Leap into a dangerous new world, created using lands torn from the Planes of Life and Fire, and achieve a new level of power.

Access to Prophecy of Ahnket Premium Content

  • Reach level 70
  • Unlock legendary abilities
  • Explore massive new zones
  • Defeat deadly dungeons
  • And more!
data.about_the_game:
The Comet of Ahnket threatens to devour Telara. Will you stand against it? Leap into a dangerous new world, created using lands torn from the Planes of Life and Fire, and achieve a new level of power.

Access to Prophecy of Ahnket Premium Content

  • Reach level 70
  • Unlock legendary abilities
  • Explore massive new zones
  • Defeat deadly dungeons
  • And more!
data.short_description: The Comet of Ahnket threatens to devour Telara. Will you stand against it? Leap into a dangerous new world, created using lands torn from the Planes of Life and Fire, and achieve a new level of power.
data.supported_languages:
French*, German*, English*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce FX 5900, ATI/AMD Radeon X300, Intel GMA X4500 or better.
  • DirectX®: 9.0c, June 2010 update
  • Hard Drive: 15.0 GB available
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compliant card
  • Other: Broadband internet connection (DSL, cable modem or other high speed connection)
